title: Consultancy Agreement Generator
original_prompt:
Imagine you are a legal expert with experience in drafting consultancy agreements. Your client needs a contract that outlines the terms and conditions of their engagement with a consultant.

Client Details:

Company Name: [Company Name]
Industry: [Industry]
Consultant Name: [Consultant Name]
Services: [Describe the specific consulting services to be provided]
Project Duration: [Duration of the consulting engagement, such as, weeks, months, or years]

Consultancy Agreement Requirements:

1. Scope of Services: [Clearly define the consultant's responsibilities, tasks, and deliverables]
2. Compensation: [Specify the consultant's fee structure, such as hourly, daily, or project-based rates, and any additional expenses]
3. Payment Terms: [Outline the payment schedule and invoicing process]
4. Term and Termination: [Define the duration of the agreement and conditions for termination by either party]
5. Confidentiality: [Include a confidentiality clause to protect sensitive company information]
6. Intellectual Property: [Establish ownership and assignment of intellectual property created during the consulting engagement]
7. Indemnification: [Specify indemnification provisions in case of breaches or third-party claims related to the consulting services]
8. Independent Contractor Status: [Clarify that the consultant is an independent contractor, not an employee, and is responsible for their own taxes, insurance, and other obligations]
9. Non-Solicitation: [Include a non-solicitation clause to prevent the consultant from poaching the company's clients or employees during and after the engagement]
10. Governing Law and Jurisdiction: [Specify the governing law and jurisdiction for the agreement]
11. Dispute Resolution: [Outline the dispute resolution mechanism, such as arbitration or litigation]

Your task is to draft a consultancy agreement for your client that covers all the required elements while ensuring compliance with relevant laws and regulations. Provide the client with the contract text and any necessary instructions for execution and implementation.

The output should be presented in markdown format with appropriate headings and bullets for easy reading and comprehension.                                                                                                                                   INPUT:
Company: OMNI Corporation
Consultant: Alex Manson
Services: Provide software development and technical consultation services
Project Duration: 6 months

        ]
    }
}
```
input1:
Company Name: Tech Innovations Inc.  
Industry: Information Technology  
Consultant Name: Sarah Johnson  
Services: Develop a comprehensive digital marketing strategy and provide ongoing analytics support  
Project Duration: 12 months
input2:
Company Name: Green Solutions Ltd.  
Industry: Environmental Consulting  
Consultant Name: David Lee  
Services: Conduct environmental impact assessments and provide recommendations for sustainable practices  
Project Duration: 3 months
input1_ans:
# Consultancy Agreement

**This Consultancy Agreement ("Agreement") is made and entered into as of [Effective Date], by and between Tech Innovations Inc. ("Company"), a corporation organized under the laws of [State], with its principal place of business at [Company Address], and Sarah Johnson ("Consultant"), an individual with a principal address at [Consultant Address].**

## 1. Scope of Services
The Consultant agrees to provide the following services ("Services") to the Company:
- Develop a comprehensive digital marketing strategy tailored to the Company's needs.
- Provide ongoing analytics support to monitor and optimize the digital marketing strategy.
- Deliver regular reports and updates on the performance of the digital marketing initiatives.

## 2. Compensation
The Company agrees to pay the Consultant as follows:
- A fee of $[Hourly/Daily/Project Rate] for the Services rendered.
- Reimbursement for any pre-approved expenses incurred in connection with the performance of the Services.

## 3. Payment Terms
- The Consultant shall submit invoices to the Company on a [weekly/monthly] basis.
- Payment shall be made within [30] days of receipt of the invoice.

## 4. Term and Termination
- This Agreement shall commence on [Effective Date] and shall continue for a period of 12 months unless terminated earlier in accordance with this section.
- Either party may terminate this Agreement with [30] days written notice to the other party.

## 5. Confidentiality
The Consultant agrees to maintain the confidentiality of all proprietary and confidential information disclosed by the Company during the term of this Agreement and thereafter.

## 6. Intellectual Property
All intellectual property created or developed by the Consultant in connection with the Services shall be the sole property of the Company. The Consultant agrees to assign all rights, title, and interest in such intellectual property to the Company.

## 7. Indemnification
The Consultant agrees to indemnify and hold harmless the Company from any claims, damages, or liabilities arising out of the Consultant's breach of this Agreement or any third-party claims related to the Services provided.

## 8. Independent Contractor Status
The Consultant is an independent contractor and not an employee of the Company. The Consultant shall be responsible for all taxes, insurance, and other obligations arising from the performance of the Services.

## 9. Non-Solicitation
During the term of this Agreement and for a period of [12] months thereafter, the Consultant agrees not to solicit or attempt to solicit any clients or employees of the Company.

## 10. Governing Law and Jurisdiction
This Agreement shall be governed by and construed in accordance with the laws of the State of [State]. Any disputes arising under this Agreement shall be resolved in the courts located in [County/City, State].

## 11. Dispute Resolution
In the event of any dispute arising out of or relating to this Agreement, the parties agree to first attempt to resolve the dispute through mediation. If mediation is unsuccessful, the parties may pursue arbitration in accordance with the rules of the American Arbitration Association.

**IN WITNESS WHEREOF, the parties hereto have executed this Consultancy Agreement as of the date first above written.**

**Tech Innovations Inc.**  
By: ___________________________  
Name: [Authorized Signatory]  
Title: [Title]  
Date: _________________________  

**Sarah Johnson**  
By: ___________________________  
Date: _________________________  

---

### Instructions for Execution
1. Fill in the [Effective Date], [State], [Company Address], [Consultant Address], [Hourly/Daily/Project Rate], and any other placeholders with the appropriate information.
2. Ensure that both parties review the terms and conditions outlined in this Agreement.
3. Have the authorized signatory of Tech Innovations Inc. sign the Agreement.
4. The Consultant should also sign the Agreement.
5. Retain a copy of the signed Agreement for your records.

    "spliting prompt": {
        "Client Details": [
            "Company Name: Tech Innovations Inc.",
            "Industry: Information Technology",
            "Consultant Name: Sarah Johnson",
            "Services: Develop a comprehensive digital marketing strategy and provide ongoing analytics support",
            "Project Duration: 12 months"
        ],
        "Consultancy Agreement Requirements": [
            "Scope of Services: [Clearly define the consultant's responsibilities, tasks, and deliverables]",
            "Compensation: [Specify the consultant's fee structure, such as hourly, daily, or project-based rates, and any additional expenses]",
            "Payment Terms: [Outline the payment schedule and invoicing process]",
            "Term and Termination: [Define the duration of the agreement and conditions for termination by either party]",
            "Confidentiality: [Include a confidentiality clause to protect sensitive company information]",
            "Intellectual Property: [Establish ownership and assignment of intellectual property created during the consulting engagement]",
            "Indemnification: [Specify indemnification provisions in case of breaches or third-party claims related to the consulting services]",
            "Independent Contractor Status: [Clarify that the consultant is an independent contractor, not an employee, and is responsible for their own taxes, insurance, and other obligations]",
            "Non-Solicitation: [Include a non-solicitation clause to prevent the consultant from poaching the company's clients or employees during and after the engagement]",
            "Governing Law and Jurisdiction: [Specify the governing law and jurisdiction for the agreement]",
            "Dispute Resolution: [Outline the dispute resolution mechanism, such as arbitration or litigation]"
        ]
    }
}

input2_ans:
# Consultancy Agreement

**This Consultancy Agreement ("Agreement") is made and entered into as of [Effective Date], by and between:**

**OMNI Corporation**  
[Company Address]  
("Company")

and

**David Lee**  
[Consultant Address]  
("Consultant")

**WHEREAS**, the Company desires to engage the Consultant to provide certain consulting services, and the Consultant agrees to provide such services under the terms and conditions set forth herein.

## 1. Scope of Services
The Consultant shall provide the following services ("Services"):
- Conduct environmental impact assessments.
- Provide recommendations for sustainable practices.
- Deliver a comprehensive report summarizing findings and recommendations.

## 2. Compensation
The Company agrees to pay the Consultant a fee of [Specify Fee Structure, e.g., $X per hour, $Y per project, etc.]. The Consultant shall also be reimbursed for any pre-approved expenses incurred in connection with the performance of the Services.

## 3. Payment Terms
- Invoices shall be submitted by the Consultant on a [monthly/bi-weekly] basis.
- Payment shall be made within [30] days of receipt of the invoice.

## 4. Term and Termination
- This Agreement shall commence on [Effective Date] and shall continue for a period of 3 months unless terminated earlier in accordance with this section.
- Either party may terminate this Agreement with [30] days written notice to the other party.

## 5. Confidentiality
The Consultant agrees to keep confidential all proprietary information and trade secrets of the Company and shall not disclose such information to any third party without the prior written consent of the Company.

## 6. Intellectual Property
All intellectual property created or developed by the Consultant in connection with the Services shall be the sole property of the Company. The Consultant agrees to assign all rights, title, and interest in such intellectual property to the Company.

## 7. Indemnification
The Consultant shall indemnify and hold harmless the Company from any claims, damages, losses, or expenses arising out of the Consultant's breach of this Agreement or any negligent acts or omissions in the performance of the Services.

## 8. Independent Contractor Status
The Consultant is an independent contractor and not an employee of the Company. The Consultant shall be responsible for all taxes, insurance, and other obligations arising from the performance of the Services.

## 9. Non-Solicitation
During the term of this Agreement and for a period of [12] months thereafter, the Consultant shall not solicit or attempt to solicit any clients or employees of the Company.

## 10. Governing Law and Jurisdiction
This Agreement shall be governed by and construed in accordance with the laws of [State/Country]. Any disputes arising under this Agreement shall be resolved in the courts of [Jurisdiction].

## 11. Dispute Resolution
In the event of any dispute arising out of or relating to this Agreement, the parties agree to first attempt to resolve the dispute through mediation. If mediation is unsuccessful, the parties may pursue arbitration or litigation as appropriate.

**IN WITNESS WHEREOF**, the parties hereto have executed this Consultancy Agreement as of the date first above written.

**OMNI Corporation**  
By: ___________________________  
Name: [Authorized Signatory]  
Title: [Title]  
Date: _________________________  

**David Lee**  
By: ___________________________  
Date: _________________________  

---

### Instructions for Execution:
1. Fill in the [Effective Date], [Company Address], [Consultant Address], [Specify Fee Structure], [State/Country], [Jurisdiction], and [Authorized Signatory] details.
2. Both parties should sign and date the Agreement.
3. Retain a copy for your records and provide a copy to the Consultant.
